articles.title: Jim Salisbury Should Be Called Out for Submitting Ridiculous MVP Ballot - Crossing Broad
articles.description: Thursday, we complained about the Cincinnati writer who had Zack Wheeler 5th on his Cy Young ballot. It was the only 5th place vote Wheeler received, and reeked of an inexperienced, multi-sport journalist failing to justify his reach. So if we’re being consis…
